page.title: 20RECREATION - NORTH TAWTON
page.content: {EVENING ACTIVITIES}which are currently running at the local Primary School under the umbrella of{Okehampton {Community College}are: Popmobility(Music and Movement) Drama Club,Bridge Club,Sewing Guild. {ACTIVITIES FOR YOUNG CHILDREN}which are available include Brownies,Cubs, Guides,Youth Club and Lively Hour. {ACTIVITIES FOR ADULTS}which are available include two W.I's,Mothers' Union,Happy Hour,Over Sixties' Club, Young Farmers' Club,Peace Group,Whist Club,Pioneers and British Legion. {CONTRIBUTORS}to the survey were:Girls- V.Yeo,K.Oakman,A.Dennis,S.Turner, V.Boughton,A.Thwaites,K.Butcher,M.Heys F.Blight.Boys:M.Keenor,A.Retter, J.Hoggins,A.Mill,P.Vanstone,K.Bridgman Teachers:Mr.B.Hardman and Mr.N.Hallam.
